name: Bonbon (itch) (Crashtroid, Yapalot)
description:
Bonbon is a prototype for an arena shooter that uses non-euclidian geometry in it's map design! Use portals to navigate between parts of the arena without even realizing it! 

In progress features include multiplayer, completed animations, and a full gunplay system, including a unique push/pull fight mechanic.

Crashtroid: Music, SFX, Level Design

Yapalot: Programming, Level Design

Sikowny: 3D Modelling, Animation

Sorrysaurus: 2D Art, Texturing, UI
